message: Hi, you have the default core module Getopt::Std (http://search.cpan.org/~jesse/perl-5.14.0/lib/Getopt/Std.pm) or the Getopt::Long (http://search.cpan.org/~jv/Getopt-Long-2.38/lib/Getopt/Long.pm). Checkout the Getopt::* namespace in CPAN and try the module that suites you most.

Hey, all. I decided to learn Perl as something that it couldn't hurt to have some experience in. Coming from using Python, I'm wondering if anyone can recommend any Perl command line handling module similar to Python's optparse or argparse modules. Thinking of porting a script I wrote in Python to Perl as a learning exercise. Thanks.
